Personas.Description:
I am a desktop and device administrator, in charge of my company’s client workstations, BYOD and corporate provided devices.  I am deeply involved in the management, maintenance, processes and security across all devices. Our desktops currently run Windows 7 and Office 2013 and we’re looking to upgrade.  We have Windows, Android and IOS devices connecting to corporate resources, including email and a custom LOB app.

Topics of interest:
	Microsoft 365 deployment and management
	Device Management and security
	Windows Updates

Immersion Zone

Labs
  • Deploy Microsoft Office as a service
  • Microsoft Intune automation with Microsoft Graph API and PowerShell
  • Deploy and manage Windows as a service
